output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240046" is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda material.
2. Refers to candidates: - Mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" (presidential candidate) - Mentions "Vlad Gheorghe" (supporting DREPT party) - Makes references to PSD (Ciolacu's party)
3. Addresses wide population: - Yes, it's a paid Facebook post with 30,000-35,000 impressions - Uses broad language addressing "buzoieni" (people of Buzău) - Makes general calls to action
4. Electoral objective: - Explicitly calls for votes: "Vă îndemn să votați partidul ✅DREPT" - Takes a stance against PSD and Marcel Ciolacu - Aims to influence voting behavior
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is clearly campaign material, not journalism - Contains direct calls to action for voting - Includes partisan messaging and campaign rhetoric
6. Personal opinion: - While expressing opinions, this is a paid, structured campaign message - Contains official CMF number - Is clearly part of an organized political campaign

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: 1. Contains official CMF number 2. Direct call to vote for a specific party 3. Paid distribution 4. Contains campaign messaging 5. Takes stance against specific candidates/parties
conclusion.message-for-police: Atelierul de Internet SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 928881002007822) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, in perioada campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Mesajul contine referiri directe la candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu, cu impact negativ asupra acestuia, si include elemente clare de propaganda electorala, fiind marcat cu cod CMF 11240046. Postarea a fost promovata activ pe Facebook, cu un buget intre 300-399 RON, atingand intre 30.000-35.000 de utilizatori, demonstrand astfel intentia clara de a influenta procesul electoral prezidential dupa incheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
